name: Baby & Mommy
description:
Help take care of Mommy before the baby is born and take care of the baby after birth. It's not easy being a mommy!

Features:
- Many different ways to help Mommy
- Take Mommy to the clinic
- Change the babies diaper
- Feed the baby
- Wipe the babies tears
- Much much more, all for free!

Come join the Baby & Mommy experience!
